snippet: Venus Williams defeated Maria Irigoyen of Argentina, 6-1, 6-4, in Buenos Aires on Sunday to help the United States advance to the Fed Cup playoffs in April, where it will have a chance to return to the World Group as one of the top eight teams.
abstract: Venus Williams beats Maria Irigoyen of Argentina, 6-1, 6-4, helping United States advance to Fed Cups; other tennis scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams defeated Maria Irigoyen of Argentina, 6-1, 6-4, in Buenos Aires on Sunday to help the United States advance to the Fed Cup playoffs in April, where it will have a chance to return to the World Group as one of the top eight teams.

headline.main: Venus Williams Helps U.S. Advance in the Fed Cup
headline.print_headline: Venus Williams Helps U.S. Advance in the Fed Cup
